name: True Knight RPG
description:
This i my first game ever, and a RPG at that, made for a No Travel Game Jam, but I will try to work on it and update it in the future, as it only has a couple of quests and it is a short game, but you can explore and try weapons and skills as you please.

Background:
You play as a young her named Patrick, who is a brave and honorable knight, who also posses magical powers..
Your mission is to help villagers and defeat the Beast boss Minotaur and his minions...

Also, please note that this was made in about 2 days..so I hope I get some tips so I can improve and sharpen my game dev. Thank you all!

I hope you ENJOY and keep safe!
